reuters.title: N.Y. COTTON FUTURES STEADY IN EARLY TRADING
reuters.body: Cotton futures were steady this morning on commission house buying. But trade selling was keeping gains to a minimum, brokers said. There was no news, but brokers said the market is technically weak and in search of a bottom. Recent news of poor export sales remained a damper, brokers said. Cotton for May delivery was up 0.25 cent at 56.05 cents a lb in a 56.30 to 55.80 cent range. December delivery was up 0.40 cent at 55.15 cents. Reuter 
